resources.string: Embraced by the nature\'s beauty, bestowed with the tranquility and serenity of Mother Nature, SSR College of Arts, Commerce and Science is the epitome of knowledge, virtue and righteousness. IT is rightly said that knowledge is the key to success and prosperity.\n \n Success is the sum of all small efforts. Success is doing what you want to do, when you want. If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths rather than the travel the worn paths of accepted success. To sum up, six essential qualities that are the key to success are: Sincerity, Personal Integrity, Humility, Courtesy, Wisdom, and Charity.

BACHELOR OF ARTS - BA 
BACHELOR OF COMMERCE- B COM 
BACHELOR OF BUSSINESS ADMINISTRATION - BBA 
BBA IN COMPUTER APPLICATION - BBA(CA) 
BACHELOR OF SCIENCE - B Sc ( Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Microbiology, Botany, zoology) 
BACHELOR OF SCIENCE - COMPUTER SCIENCE -BSC-CS 
MASTER OF COMMERCE - M COM 
MASTER OF SCIENCE- M SC IN ORGANIC CHEMISTRY *We are permitted to fill 10% more seats.

Our college carries out placements on regular basis. Many companies and placement agency look for our fresher for Quality control, Production and R & D in pharma and chemical industries. Our students are also absorbed in Banking and Finance, Insurance and MNC corporates apart from our placements in Silvassa and Vapi Industrial Zone where 3000 companies are operational. Company list and placement agency for campus placements are
